description: Adversaries may attempt to get a listing of network connections to or from the compromised system they are currently accessing or from remote systems by querying for information over the network.
author: frack113
name: System Network Connections Discovery Via Net.EXE
query: (((process.executable.text:("*\\net.exe" OR "*\\net1.exe")) OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:("net.exe" OR "net1.exe"))) AND ((process.command_line.text:("*\ use" OR "*\ sessions")) OR (process.command_line.text:("*\ use\ *" OR "*\ sessions\ *"))))
